title: Jasmin Wagner
summary: Jasmin Wagner (pronounced [jasˈmiːn ˈvaːɡnɐ]; born 20 April 1980), better known as Blümchen (pronounced [ˈblyːmçən] (listen)), is a German pop and dance music singer and actress. Although she releases her English albums under the name Blossom, her German stage name Blümchen actually translates to "floret" or "small flower".
